GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS
Issued at 04.00 p.m. on 04 April 2023

S
howers or thundershowers will occur at several places in Uva, Central, Southern, Sabaragamuwa,
Western, North-Western and North-Central provinces and in Mannar district during the afternoon
or night. Fairly heavy showers above 50mm are likely at some places in above areas.

G
eneral public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by
temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
